      Methods in org.sonatype.aether.repository that return RepositoryPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the policy to apply for snapshot/release artifacts.
      RepositoryPolicy RepositoryPolicy.setChecksumPolicy(String checksumPolicy)
      Sets the policy for checksum validation.
      RepositoryPolicy RepositoryPolicy.setEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Sets the enabled flag for the associated repository.
      RepositoryPolicy RepositoryPolicy.setUpdatePolicy(String updatePolicy)
      Sets the update policy for locally cached data from the repository.
